- Hello, my name is Roman Filipenko!
- I am a frontend developer from Russia.
- I always loved to create different stuff and ever since I found web development, it's been a passion of mine to work on different projects.
- In recent year I had a pleasure to go through internship in EPAM, where I gained experience working on a real project with big team.

About me

I have a knowledge of JavaScript and HTML, bundlers such as: Gulp and Webpack. I use git for my vcs and had worked with GitLab and GitHub.
I also know Angular and RxJS.I have some experience with Docker, Postgres and Jira from the time when I worked as an intern in EPAM.
I have worked on internal CI/CD project with a full team of developers using Agile as our methodology. We used Angular as Frontend languaue, Java as our backend, and Jira to monitor our tasks.
My goals is to grow from junior frontend developer to a fullstack developer.
